explains: v. 吊起，提升；<非正式>投篮
n. 吊升机械，起重机；吊起，升起；旗宽（贴近旗杆的部分）；（一串）信号旗
wordGroup: mine hoist 矿井提升机；矿井吊车

sentences.en: He uses a hydraulic hoist to unload two empty barrels.
sentences.cn: 他用一架液压起重机卸下两只空桶。

sentences.en: Smaller sails are lighter, easier to hoist and trim, and smaller to stow.
sentences.cn: 小的帆面更轻，更容易升起和拉平，收储起来也更小。

sentences.en: By using a hoist the movers were able to sling the piano to the third floor.
sentences.cn: 搬运工人用吊车才把钢琴吊到3楼。
